There seems to exist a trilemma in decentralized identity analogous to @Zooko's triangle. 

None of the existing solutions are at the same time: 
1) privacy-preserving, 
2) Sybil-resistant 
3) self-sovereign 

They get 2/3 at best. 

Blog post: http://maciek.blog/decentralized-identity-trilemma/ …

Thread pic.twitter.com/KoZQPOkSir

623937307628949504.text: 10/ caveat: MARKETING PLANS & EXPENSE PROJECTIONS are ok -- that tells us where/how u want 2 spend u $$$ we give u (& whether ur crazy ;)

623936935493529600.text: 9/ in summary: STOP writing screenplays, STOP making guesses & lies, START encouraging founders to JUST BUILD PRODUCTS and GET CUSTOMERS.

623936571130183680.text: 8/ biz plans & revenue projections are nice ideas AT BEST, more likely they are LIES & EXCUSES instead of getting STARTED on REAL BUSINESS.

623936211737006081.text: 7/ if you choose business plans & revenue projections over ACTUAL prototypes & biz metrics, you are picking SCREENWRITERS over FOUNDERS.

623935694189236224.text: 6/ the REASON people built biz plans in past is because it was HARD 2 measure ACTUAL PROGRESS. but NOW we can get BIZ METRICS IN REAL-TIME.

623935201769598978.text: 5/ if you want to highlight WINNERS, then judge product prototypes, measure unit economics, & ask 4 early customer growth adoption charts.

623934892359970820.text: 4/ if you continue to judge business plan competitions & revenue projections as if they are winners / real businesses, YOU ARE A HYPOCRITE.

623934600281227264.text: 3/ encouraging entrepreneurs 2 guess future metrics & outcomes is THEATER, & not what makes BUSINESS. build prototypes & go get customers .

623934206268317696.text: 2/ similarly, STOP ASKING FOR 3-5 YEAR REVENUE PROJECTIONS. (if you want, ask for 12-month EXPENSE projections). you're asking for LIES.

623933931788857346.text: 1/ Dear Startup Investors: STOP PARTICIPATING IN BUSINESS PLAN COMPETITIONS. You are propping up a HORRIBLE practice in the industry.
